data.system_settings: Nexus 6P, Android O Preview, Discord 3.5.9 / Nexus 4, Android 5.1.1, Discord 3.5.9
data.actual_result: It takes about a second for your voice to start transmitting, and the animations on the push-to-talk button seem slow as well
data.expected_result: Your beautiful voice comes through loud and clear
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you're using push-to-talk - Join voice channel - Hold down the push-to-talk button
